River fly kick sampling on the River Douglas for 2021 has started. 
Monitoring of aquatic insect life gives us an indication of the current health of the water. 
The first sample results are a real cause for concern. We have serious water quality issues. @EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/2rWzR5G0zM
